com.java.calumjohnston.randomgenerators

Class pseudorandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.calumjohnston.randomgenerators.pseudorandom

  • public class pseudorandom
extends java.lang.Object
    The class produces sequence of unique numbers within a set range based off a key. The key is some user input (typically a password). Designed for Image Steganography
